Assoc. Şekercioğlu is an extraordinary researcher who is impressively recognized as an accomplished, well-known artisan.

(1/7) On December 3rd 2013, I met the CEOs of Ophir Energy (UK) and Pavilion Ltd (Singapore). #Energy #Gas #Tanzania
(2/7) Ophir introduced Pavilion Ltd, the new partner in exploration of three blocks (1,3 &  4) in Tanzania currently under BG Group & Ophir.
(3/7) We welcome the Singapore company & we've assured them full Government support in the conclusion of the transfer of partial ownership.
(4/7) We have assured them that our government will smoothly facilitate the transaction of the shares. #Tanzania #Energy
(5/7) We have also assured them a timely approvals from the relevant Tanzanian authorities as according to Tanzanian laws and regulations.
(6/7) This investment is a key milestone in the government's strategy of adding value in the exploration process. #Tanzania #Energy
(7/7) The government will continue to support and work together with investors in accordance to Tanzanian laws and regulations. #Tanzania

A great light has gone out in the world. Nelson Mandela was a hero of our time. I've asked for the flag at No10 to be flown at half mast.
#Mandela changed course of history for his people, country, continent & the world. My thoughts are w/his family&people of #SouthAfrica/JMB
All of Canada with the family of Nelson Mandela and the citizens of South Africa. The world has lost one of its great moral leaders.
The world has lost a great man. As we grieve for Nelson Mandela we should also celebrate his tremendous victory over prejudice and hate. JG
Nelson #Mandela - one of the greatest political figures of our times. Let's honour his memory by collective commitment to democracy
about Mandela's death: 'South Africa and the world are losing a unique person and a great leader'.
"Mandela had an unprecedented charisma & great moral authority. A connector: not confrontational, but conciliatory. Commemorate him with great respect '
I have directed all Ministries, Departments and Agencies not to use public resources for Christmas and New Year gifts.
Nelson Mandela is dead. The biggest leader of our time. One of the wizards of humanity in morality and courage. We take care of the South African people.
The world has lost Nelson Mandela, the greatest leader of our time. A guide for human courage. We mourn with the people of South Africa.
The world has lost one of its greatest citizens. A voice of courage, a source of inspiration and a beloved leader to us all. #Mandela
Nelson #Mandela served his nation n Africa well. We have lost an icon in the liberation struggle n an illustrious son of our continent.
http://t.co/yL4z0UVt9P #Mandela, one of our times' greatest political figures.Let's honour his memory by commitment to democracy & tolerance
I've spoken to the Speaker and there will be statements and tributes to Nelson Mandela in the House on Monday.
Nelson Mandela was inspirational. On behalf of NZ I’d like to express my sincere condolences to his family and all South Africans.
Madiba- President (1st,post-apartheid SA) passes on-but what is certain he will continue to live in the hearts of many of us # rest in peace
Nelson Madiba Mandela was the hero for all freedom loving people. He will always be remembered for what he gave the world -  human dignity.
Madiba was one of the greatest leaders in the world. He changed the world. My sympathies to the family and to the world for this loss.
This day we said goodbye to one of the greatest leaders that this world has had, Nelson Mandela.
Read my joint statement w/ @euHvR on the passing away of Nelson #Mandela @NelsonMandela http://t.co/6twiNh0QMT
I was privileged to know him and he was a true inspiration. I will always cherish his memory
